comments.body: nit: no need to get global here and pass to `addLegacyCloudProviderCredentialProviderFlags `. It can be taken when needed.

diff on master between last green and first failed:
```
$ git diff b9a62423c6215a154eda712d91f6dcd83403e236 10a98ef1ea26a1426ecf4a0d23722955215f8fdd --numstat

```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@	"k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/version/verflag"

	// ensure libs have a chance to globally register their flags
	_ "github.com/golang/glog"
	_ "github.com/google/cadvisor/container/common"
